short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension which tracks Bitcoin prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension Tracks and Shows Bitcoin Price in United States Dollar.

This Extension is Extremely precise and Powerful.

Price changes every Seconds so DO NOT MISS IT!
